interpretation: The "telescope" card represents the act of searching for truth and gaining new perspective. This card encourages the seeker to look beyond their current circumstances and explore new possibilities. It suggests the need for clarity and focus, as well as the importance of taking a step back to gain a wider view. The "telescope" card may also indicate the need for introspection and self-reflection, as well as the potential for discovery and revelation. Associated keywords include exploration, observation, curiosity, clarity, perspective, and insight. When this card appears in a reading, it may be a sign to take a more objective approach to a situation and to consider all available options before making a decision. Overall, the "telescope" card encourages the seeker to look beyond the surface and to seek out the deeper truths that lie beneath.
